data.persona: I am a pastor. I am the priest in charge of a village church where the parishioners are everyday people. I provide hope of a heavenly rest for people whose lives are short and difficult. I do baptisms, weddings, and funerals, and I try to help my parishioners discern the hand of God in their daily lives.
data.description:
You are in the Main entrance.
There are religious statues standing outside this temple.  The outside of the temple is fairly plain itself and imposing looking.  The floor is made out of stone with a bridge leading to the entrance.
There's a bridge, a candle holder, a Bench, a torch, and a statue here.
The worshipper and the high priestess are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to light some candles and place them in the holder
data.mid_motivation: I am performing the usual procedure that marks the beginning of the baptism week
data.long_motivation: I have the important duty of ensuring that the young ones of the village are all baptized and dedicated to God as soon as they are old enough

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put lit candles on candle holder

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get ready to baptize the young ones
